column4: hey everyone, can someone help me? I'm using Envy to install my Radeon 9550 drivers, but with the new drivers (8.02 or 8.01) everything goes very slow (70ish fps in glxgears). with the 8.40 drivers, I get like 2200fps in glxgears, however, with 8.40, I can't use compiz
Well, with the binary drivers from the Restricted Manager, nothing works
So I had to use Envy
if you say so, but in doing so, I am not sure you will find help here
